about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.summary: I'm a motivated and detail-oriented Junior Backend Developer with proven experience in building dynamic web applications and secure backend systems. My expertise lies in Laravel, MySQL, and API development, where I focus on performance, scalability, and clean architecture. I am passionate about backend logic, real-time interaction, and working collaboratively in a modern development environment.

timeline.subtitle: My journey in technology and professional development

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: Technologies I work with
skills.summary: Passionate about continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices in software development.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey
experience.summaryText: Throughout my career, I have focused on building scalable backend systems and delivering high-quality web applications. My experience spans from developing RESTful APIs to creating real-time web applications with modern frameworks.
